<item>
<title><![CDATA[ India vs South Africa, 1st T20I: Shikhar Dhawan, Bhuvneshwar Kumar dominate India&#039;s 28-run win]]></title>
<link><![CDATA[ http://zeenews.india.com/cricket/india-vs-south-africa-1st-t20i-shikhar-dhawan-bhuvneshwar-kumar-dominate-indias-28-run-win-2082261.html ]]></link>
<description><![CDATA[ Dhawan scored 72 off 39 balls to power India to 203/5 and Bhuvneshwar (5/24) followed it up with his maiden five-for in T20Is to script India's big win in the first match of the series at Jo'burg.
 ]]></description>
 <pubDate><![CDATA[Sunday, February 18, 2018, 21:46  +0530]]></pubDate>
 <comments><![CDATA[mailto:inewsonline@gmail.com]]></comments>
 <guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[http://zeenews.india.com/cricket/india-vs-south-africa-1st-t20i-shikhar-dhawan-bhuvneshwar-kumar-dominate-indias-28-run-win-2082261.html]]></guid>
</item>

<title><![CDATA[ New world No.1 Roger Federer beats Grigor Dimitrov to win Rotterdam Open]]></title>
<link><![CDATA[ http://zeenews.india.com/tennis/new-world-no-1-roger-federer-beats-grigor-dimitrov-to-win-rotterdam-open-2082260.html ]]></link>
<description><![CDATA[ Roger Federer celebrated his impending return to the top of the world rankings by winning the Rotterdam Open on Sunday, his 97th title.
 ]]></description>
 <pubDate><![CDATA[Sunday, February 18, 2018, 21:40  +0530]]></pubDate>
 <comments><![CDATA[mailto:inewsonline@gmail.com]]></comments>
 <guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[http://zeenews.india.com/tennis/new-world-no-1-roger-federer-beats-grigor-dimitrov-to-win-rotterdam-open-2082260.html]]></guid>
</item>

<title><![CDATA[  Kusal Mendis drives Sri Lanka to T20 series sweep against Bangladesh]]></title>
<link><![CDATA[ http://zeenews.india.com/cricket/kusal-mendis-drives-sri-lanka-to-t20-series-sweep-against-bangladesh-2082259.html ]]></link>
<description><![CDATA[ Opener Kusal Mendis hit a blazing half-century as Sri Lanka thrashed Bangladesh by 75 runs in the second Twenty20 to complete a 2-0 series sweep on Sunday.
 ]]></description>

<title><![CDATA[  Belarus leader Alexander Lukashenko fumes after skier Anton Kushnir failed to qualify for Olympic final]]></title>
<link><![CDATA[ http://zeenews.india.com/other-sports/belarus-leader-alexander-lukashenko-fumes-after-skier-anton-kushnir-failed-to-qualify-for-olympic-final-2082234.html ]]></link>
<description><![CDATA[ Belarus leader Alexander Lukashenko on Sunday accused judges of unfairly "throwing out" skier Anton Kushnir from the Olympic final, after rousing the country`s diplomats the night before to get them to complain to the IOC.
 ]]></description>
 <pubDate><![CDATA[Sunday, February 18, 2018, 20:12  +0530]]></pubDate>
 <comments><![CDATA[mailto:inewsonline@gmail.com]]></comments>

<title><![CDATA[ India women slump after middle-order collapse, lose third T20 against South Africa]]></title>
